query: Oregon Gran Fondo gravel race Cottage Grove

videos.title: Oregon Gran Fondo 2025, May 18, Cottage Grove
videos.description:
Description:
Ride along on a wonderful day at the 2025 Oregon Gran Fondo bicycle event, in Cottage Grove, Oregon, with 67-year-old Chip Weinert as he completes the 66-mile Medio route.

#oregon 
#mudslinger
#granfondo 
#cycling 
#mountains 
#bicycling 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
✅ SUBSCRIBE to My YouTube Channel HERE
https://www.youtube.com/@chipweinert3864  
🔔TURN ON ALL NOTIFICATIONS BELL🔔

"LIFE IS TWICE AS GOOD ON TWO WHEELS"

videos.title: Oregon Gran Fondo 2017
videos.description: One of the best Road routes on the West Coast the first Saturday in June. 42,70,117 and 137 Mile options starting and ending in Cottage Grove Oregon

videos.title: 2-Wheeled Wednesdays - Oregon Gran Fondo 2023
videos.description: A 72-mile bicycle ride through the western foothills of Oregon's Cosatal Range with 300 other cyclists.
videos.transcript:

videos.title: Hundreds Compete In Oregon Gran Fondo
videos.description: Hundreds of cyclists from all over the Pacific Northwest enjoyed the Oregon scenery Sunday as they raced in the third annual Oregon Gran Fondo, which started and ended in Cottage Grove.
videos.transcript:
one after another cyclist crossed the
